markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Glutton for Flesh](/Feats.aspx?ID=3511) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 49</row>

**Archetype** [Ghoul](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=178)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghoul Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3504)

</column>

---

You have developed a capacity to store more flesh within your gaunt body to leave yourself satiated longer. If you [Consume Flesh](/Feats.aspx?ID=3504) while satiated, you become fully satiated. You stay fully satiated for 3 hours, after which you become satiated for 1 hour. If you're fully satiated when an ability would end your satiation, you cease being fully satiated but remain satiated. If you have [Grave Strength](/Feats.aspx?ID=3508), you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed when fully satiated instead of a +5-foot status bonus for being satiated.

<title level="2">Glutton for Flesh leads to...</title>
[Competitive Eater](/Feats.aspx?ID=3889)
name: Glutton for Flesh
